## getZomeCaller() function

Get a shorthand function to call a cell's zome.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getZomeCaller: (cell: CallableCell, zomeName: string) => <T>(fnName: string, payload?: unknown, timeout?: number) => Promise<T>
```
